name: Dice 3D - physics engine powered dice for the next game night
name_original: Dice 3D - physics engine powered dice for the next game night
description:
Realistic-looking dice in 3D!
With this app you will always have the right dice on your TV for the next game night!

The special thing about this dice app is that the dice fall realistically and in real time, thanks to the physics engine.
To roll the dice, you can simply tap your "Siri Remote". You can decide how many dice to play at the same time! Up to six dice can be played simultaneously.

Features:
- 1 to 6 dice (enough for each board game)
- Convincing realtime 3D graphics and animation
- Real dice! The dice fall or roll realistically thanks to the complex physics engine
- Sounds like real dice
- The sum of the dice are calculated and displayed automatically
